markdownRemark.html: I’m a dude from a faraway land called the Philippines whose current professional interest just happens to be the 𝕞𝕪𝕤𝕥𝕚𝕔𝕒𝕝 𝕒𝕣𝕥 of typed functional programming. Now, that we’ve got the token far-eastern mysticism away: I’m a big fan of Scala, Haskell is kinda like that cute barista chick at the coffee shop whose number I’d like to ask but am too shy to. I dunno if functional programming is the final frontier (probably isn’t) but it’s been a pretty great experience immersing myself in it so far. ᴵ ᵏⁱⁿᵈᵃ ⁿᵉᵉᵈ ᵃ ʲᵒᵇ. Srsly though, help me get a foot in the door of the pure functional programming world and I’ll help you make something to write home about.
